power.title: All-Encompassing Nature
power.fluff: Your view of nature is broader than most, expanding your knowledge

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Nature.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a knowledge check using Arcana, Dungeoneering, or Religion

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your Nature check modifier for the triggering check instead of the original check modifier.

power.title: Barkskin
power.fluff: A protective layer of tree bark covers an ally's body or armor

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. The bonus equals your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Bear's Strength
power.fluff: Primal energy surges through your ally, granting him or her the strength of a wild beast

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains the following benefits until the end of his or her next extended rest:
+2 power bonus to damage rolls and flat damage that includes the target's Stength modifier.
+2 power bonus to Athletics checks and Strength ability checks.
The target's Strength increases by 5 for the purposes of determining carrying capacity.

power.title: Cat's Grace
power.fluff: You imbue an ally with the quick reflexes and agility of a jungle cat

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains the following benefits until the end of his or her next extended rest:
+1 power bonus to Reflex. This changes to a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex when the target has the defense bonuses from second wind or total defense.
+2 power bonus to Initiative checks, Dexterity-based skill checks, and Dexterity ability checks.

power.title: Dust Eddy
power.fluff: You surround yourself with a violent swirl of wind that fills the air with dust and debris

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 (Primal) until the end of your next turn. The aura immediately ends if you leave beast form.
While the aura is active, you have concealment.
Any enemy that ends its turn in the aura is blinded until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Elk's Fortitude
power.fluff: You imbue an ally with the endurance and steadfast determination of an elk

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains the following benefits until the end of his or her next extended rest:
The target's number of healing surges increases by 1.
+1 power bonus to Fortitude.
+2 power bonus to Endurance checks and Constitution ability checks.

power.title: Ferocious Transformation
power.fluff: In response to an enemy's attack, you transform into a beast

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the wild shape class power.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits you with an attack while you aren't in beast form

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your wild shape class power to change into beast form.

section.name: Agile Form feat:
section.text: You cannot shift during this change.

section.name: Pouncing Form feat:
section.text: You can shift half the distance you normally can, but if you do, you do not shift after the triggering attack has been resolved.
After the triggering attack has been resolved, you can shift 1 square and gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Agile Form feat:
section.text: You can shift up to 3 squares, or up to 4 squares starting at 21st level.

section.name: Pouncing Form feat:
section.text: If you did not shift immediately, you can now shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier instead.

power.title: Fleet Pursuit
power.fluff: Your limbs propel you forward with the speed of the cheetah

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a power bonus to speed equal to 1 + one-half your Dexterity modifier while you are in beast form.

section.name: Special:
section.text: If you use this power outside of combat, the effects lasts for 2 hours. If the effects have lasted for more than five minutes and combat starts, the power ends at the start of your first turn.

power.title: Form of the Skittering Sneak
power.fluff: You adopt the form of tiny animal that wouldn't draw a second glance from most observers

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the form of the skittering sneak until you take an extended rest or until you end the form as a free action.

While in this form, your look like your choice of a Tiny natural beast or fey beast, such as a mouse, a house cat, a large spider, or the fey equivalent of one. You size is Tiny and you gain a +5 bonus to Stealth checks, but you cannot attack, manipulate objects, or use any magic item powers. Also, your gear becomes part of the form and is inaccessible.

power.title: Form of the Sprinting Elk
power.fluff: Your form shifts as you assume the guise of a great elk and quickly bound away

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the form of the sprinting elk until you take an extended rest or until you end the form as a free action.
While in this form, you gain a +4 bonus to speed, but you cannot attack, manipulate objects, or use any magic item powers. Also, your gear becomes part of the form and is inaccessible.

power.title: Lesser Restoration
power.fluff: Motes of green energy suffuse your ally, letting him or her draw strength from the essence of the world

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can make a saving throw to end an effect that a save can end, and can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Obscuring Mist
power.fluff: A thick fog coalesces from nowhere, hiding your allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of thick fog until the end of your next turn.
Squares in the zone are lightly obscured, and squares beyond 5 are heavily obscured. Nonmagical light sources only illuminate half their normal distance within the zone.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persist until the end of your next turn, and you can increase the size of the burst by 1, to a maximum of burst 5.

If you used this power outside of combat, you can increase it to a maximum of burst 10, can keep sustaining it for up to 1 hour, and can move the zone up to 5 squares each time you sustain it. If combat starts and you have sustained the power for more than 5 minutes, the zone disappears at the start of your first turn.

section.name: Sustain Free:
section.text: The burst's size is halved, and it persist until the end of your next turn. You cannot continue sustaining the zone.

power.title: Resist Energy
power.fluff: Magical energy washes around you, but your primal magic protects you and those close to you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You take cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains resit 5 to the triggering damage type or types until the end of his or her next turn.

power.title: Seed of Healing
power.fluff: Primal power threads through you, coalescing into a golden seed ripe with healing magic

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to create a gold seed. The seed is the size of an acorn, and lasts until it is eaten or until the end of your next extended rest, whichever comes first.
A creature carrying the seed can take the following action:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: The creature retrieves and eats the seed, and regains a number of hit points equal to 10 + your healing surge value.

power.title: Sudden Bite
power.fluff: When your foe drops its guard, you change into a beast to strike

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the wild shape class power, and a Beast Form attack power you can use to make a reactive strike.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy provokes a reactive strike from you while you aren't in beast form

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your wild shape class power to change into beast form, and then make the reactive strike.

power.title: Verdant Growth
power.fluff: Plants erupt to hide your allies and block your enemies' sight

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of thick plants that lasts until the end of your next turn.
The zone is lightly obscured, and allies gain a +5 bonus to Stealth checks if hiding within the zone.
For your enemies, the zone is heavily obscured and blocks sight beyond three squares.

power.title: Warding Wind
power.fluff: Winds howl around you, shielding you from harm and hurling your attacker away

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits you with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of the triggering enemy's next turn.
If the triggering attack missed you, you can slide the triggering enemy 2 squares.
